relatedRecords.name: cybernetix.world
relatedRecords.description: cybernetix.world is a first decentralized event for global communities. This event offers you talks, panel discussions and workshops relevant for an enterprise executive but also for a private citizen. The event will cover all aspects of digitalization and the interaction of humans and technology.
